snippet: We use outdated, illogical racial and ethnic categories. Social reality is much more complex.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Prof Richard Alba observes notion that whites will soon be minority in America is fallacious, and based on outdated racial and ethnic categories; says census data misses preponderance of mixed-race births and mixed-race adults who do not identify as such; notes trends are in line with America's legacy of assimilation, but that society has so far failed to develop language to capture nuanced reality of its racial diversity.
lead_paragraph: We use outdated, illogical racial and ethnic categories. Social reality is much more complex.

headline.print_headline: The Myth of a White Minority
headline.main: The Myth of a White Minority
